mapper.select: SELECT room.meeting_room_name as roomName , room.meeting_room_peoples as roomPeoples, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(e.equipment_name,'--', re.counts) ) as equimentInfo FROM room_equiment re LEFT JOIN meeting_room room on room.id = re.meetroom_id LEFT JOIN equipment e on e.id = re.equiment_id GROUP BY room.meeting_room_name
